title: Orange and blue
creator_credit: Jane Chermayeff, Peter Chermayeff, Harvard Film Service, Harvard University and Contemporary Films
brief_description: Two coloured balls embark on an adventure as they travel through rural and industrial settings. The skilled animation and complimentary soundtrack gives the balls entertaining personalities. Music by Joseph Raposos.
creator_credit_for_label: Jane Chermayeff, Peter Chermayeff, Harvard Film Service, Harvard University and Contemporary Films
